short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto Clicker Cookie Clicker is A simple helper extension for Cookie Clicker players. Have fun!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Auto Clicker for Cookie Clicker is a Chrome extension that automates the tedious clicking required in the popular incremental game Cookie Clicker. This extension allows players to set the clicking speed and duration, enabling them to earn cookies at a much faster rate without the need for constant manual clicking.

The extension seamlessly integrates with the Cookie Clicker game, providing an efficient and convenient way to progress through the game's challenges. With the Auto Clicker, players can focus on building their cookie empire and unlocking new upgrades, while the extension handles the repetitive clicking for them. This tool is particularly useful for players who want to optimize their gameplay or those who wish to multitask while letting the game run in the background. The Auto Clicker for Cookie Clicker is a must-have for any serious Cookie Clicker enthusiast.

*Note:
This extension works on:
 Cookie Clicker: https://cookie-clicker.classroom-6x.org/
